title: Fair Value Gap
content:
The indicator finds fair value gaps on the current and higher timeframes. The fair value gap is determined on a three-bar range in which the leftmost high is lower than the rightmost low or the leftmost low is higher than the rightmost high.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.


Indicator's settings

Settings

NameDescription
Timeframe Allows you to select one of the available timeframes.

Options:
  • M1
  • M5
  • M10
  • M15
  • M30
  • Hourly
  • H2
  • H4
  • H6
  • Daily
  • Weekly
  • Monthly
Midpoint touch Determines whether to display the middle line.
Hide olds Allows you to hide these elements on the history, displaying only the current ones.
Transparency This setting allows users to customize transparency of the visual objects on the chart.

Current time frame

NameDescription
Show Determines whether to display the specified gaps.
Bullish color Sets the color for elements with a bullish direction.
Bearish color Sets the color for elements with a bearish direction.
